an5.79:1.1: “Pancimani, bhikkhave, anagatabhayani etarahi asamuppannani ayatim samuppajjissanti.
an5.79:2.2: Bhavissanti, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anagatamaddhanam abhavitakaya abhavitasila abhavitacitta abhavitapanna.
an5.79:2.3: Te abhavitakaya samana abhavitasila abhavitacitta abhavitapanna anne upasampadessanti.
an5.79:2.4: Tepi na sakkhissanti vinetum adhisile adhicitte adhipannaya.
an5.79:2.5: Tepi bhavissanti abhavitakaya abhavitasila abhavitacitta abhavitapanna.
an5.79:2.6: Te abhavitakaya samana abhavitasila abhavitacitta abhavitapanna anne upasampadessanti.
an5.79:2.7: Tepi na sakkhissanti vinetum adhisile adhicitte adhipannaya.
an5.79:2.8: Tepi bhavissanti abhavitakaya abhavitasila abhavitacitta abhavitapanna.
an5.79:2.11: Idam, bhikkhave, pathamam anagatabhayam etarahi asamuppannam ayatim samuppajjissati.
an5.79:3.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhavissanti bhikkhu anagatamaddhanam abhavitakaya abhavitasila abhavitacitta abhavitapanna.
an5.79:3.2: Te abhavitakaya samana abhavitasila abhavitacitta abhavitapanna annesam nissayam dassanti.
an5.79:3.3: Tepi na sakkhissanti vinetum adhisile adhicitte adhipannaya.
an5.79:3.4: Tepi bhavissanti abhavitakaya abhavitasila abhavitacitta abhavitapanna.
an5.79:3.5: Te abhavitakaya samana abhavitasila abhavitacitta abhavitapanna annesam nissayam dassanti.
an5.79:3.6: Tepi na sakkhissanti vinetum adhisile adhicitte adhipannaya.
an5.79:3.7: Tepi bhavissanti abhavitakaya abhavitasila abhavitacitta abhavitapanna.
an5.79:3.10: Idam, bhikkhave, dutiyam anagatabhayam etarahi asamuppannam ayatim samuppajjissati.
an5.79:4.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhavissanti bhikkhu anagatamaddhanam abhavitakaya abhavitasila abhavitacitta abhavitapanna.
an5.79:4.2: Te abhavitakaya samana abhavitasila abhavitacitta abhavitapanna abhidhammakatham vedallakatham kathenta kanhadhammam okkamamana na bujjhissanti.
an5.79:4.5: Idam, bhikkhave, tatiyam anagatabhayam etarahi asamuppannam ayatim samuppajjissati.
an5.79:5.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhavissanti bhikkhu anagatamaddhanam abhavitakaya abhavitasila abhavitacitta abhavitapanna.
an5.79:5.2: Te abhavitakaya samana abhavitasila abhavitacitta abhavitapanna ye te suttanta tathagatabhasita gambhira gambhirattha lokuttara sunnatappatisamyutta, tesu bhannamanesu na sussusissanti, na sotam odahissanti, na anna cittam upatthapessanti, na ca te dhamme uggahetabbam pariyapunitabbam mannissanti.
an5.79:5.3: Ye pana te suttanta kavita kaveyya cittakkhara cittabyanjana bahiraka savakabhasita, tesu bhannamanesu sussusissanti, sotam odahissanti, anna cittam upatthapessanti, te ca dhamme uggahetabbam pariyapunitabbam mannissanti.
an5.79:5.6: Idam, bhikkhave, catuttham anagatabhayam etarahi asamuppannam ayatim samuppajjissati.
an5.79:6.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhavissanti bhikkhu anagatamaddhanam abhavitakaya abhavitasila abhavitacitta abhavitapanna.
an5.79:6.2: Te abhavitakaya samana abhavitasila abhavitacitta abhavitapanna thera bhikkhu bahulika bhavissanti sathalika okkamane pubbangama paviveke nikkhittadhura, na viriyam arabhissanti appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya.
an5.79:6.4: Sapi bhavissati bahulika sathalika okkamane pubbangama paviveke nikkhittadhura, na viriyam arabhissati appattassa pattiya anadhigatassa adhigamaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya.
an5.79:6.7: Idam, bhikkhave, pancamam anagatabhayam etarahi asamuppannam ayatim samuppajjissati.
an5.79:7.1: Imani kho, bhikkhave, panca anagatabhayani etarahi asamuppannani ayatim samuppajjissanti.
